name: Lamont Doherty Earth Observatory
tagline: A DgS Airborne gravity system was a major instrument on the Rosetta Project Antarctic Survey

name: British Antarctic Survey
tagline: DgS is currently manufacturing an AT1 Marine gravity system for BAS's new research vessel the RRS Sir David Attenborough

name: Natural Environment Research Council (NOC)
tagline: DgS supplies and supports gravity instruments on the NOC (National Oceanography Centre) research vessels RRS Discovery and RRS James Cook

name: National Geodetic Survey
tagline: Using Airborne Gravity to map the Geoid
